subject: hellow
body:
hellow
your $10.5m have approve to be pay to you contact Mr.william Codger email

best regards
Mr. John Wood

subject: Re:   hellow
body:
Hello! That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about how I have been approved for payment? What is the process for receiving it?

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: hellow
body:
send your information of origin of the heritance fund approved to be paid
to you by the US bank America


Thank you


Mr Williams Codger

subject: Re: hellow
body:
Hello Mr. Williams Codger, thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more details about the inheritance fund approved by the US bank Erica? I would like to learn more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: hellow
body:
Then if you was told to contact bank of America the send your full detail
information including your driver's license copy for the verification of
what we have in the payment files


Thank you



Mr Williams Codger

subject: Re: hellow
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more information about why my full details and driver's license copy are needed? I want to make sure I understand the situation clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: hellow
body:
sorry more information cannot be given to you for security reason to avoid
diverting someone's fund

subject: Re: hellow
body:
Oh, I understand the need for security measures. Can you provide more details on how the funds are being managed to ensure they reach the right recipients?

Best wishes,
Gregory
